    • Constructor Detail

      • APIHandler

        public APIHandler(java.lang.String URL)
           throws APIException
        APIHandler

        Utility for handling remote API's

        Parameters:
        URL - API url
        Throws:
        APIException - thrown if there is an issue accessing API. Details will be in the getMessage()
